title: Onmic
description: A voice-streaming platform towards barrier-free expression and authentic connection through voice

body.raw:
## Short Explanation
As the first audio application developed by Vietnamese people, OnMic provides the ability to create live chat rooms (voice-streaming), with interaction between speakers and listeners. Instead of using text, photos, or videos as a means of communication, OnMic allows people to "gather" in audio chat rooms to listen and talk about a variety of topics. Here, users can build relationships with friends and colleagues quickly with just a smartphone without spending any money. > ## Tech Stack Used - Agora: Buid live stream real-time audio sytem. - Redux: Manage global state - Mantine + TailwindCSS: build components faster and easy to customize - Apollo: fetch data from api (Graphql) and handle response with cache > ## Features

> ## Lessons Learned This is the first project that i had worked in a product company. I experienced the process of making a technology product, then maintaining and fixing bugs.
We are keep track of everything in Trello and assign the task on that app. It is really fun working with a lot of people and try bunch of new ideas and communicate our differences. I also learned a lot about developing a website with a bunch of floating illustrations and absolutely-positioned elements. I usually avoid making designs with illustrations that are absolutely-positioned

title: Prime Partner
description: Online dating and geosocial networking application

body.raw:
## Short Explanation
Prime Partner is an online dating and geosocial networking application. In Prime, users can like or dislike other users' profiles, which include their photos, a short bio, and a list of their interests. - Zustant: manage global states and handle authenticate user - Vite: build and config source code - Mantine: lib ui for build components faster and practice with it - React Query + Axios: fetch data from api and handle response with cache > ## Features Prime has changed the way people date, create meaningful relationships & network with women making the first move. Meet new people. - Find someone of the opposite sex: you can find and search some with the opposite sex with you. Every feature in search which for free, so users can search for anyone they want - Match & Chat: when you find someone you like or want to get to know, you can send them a free message to get to know them or you can like them. If the other like you too, bold of you will receive notification and text each other without limits - Create your own community: you can create your own community with public or prive privacy. Owner of the community can be setting or delete every post which posted in new feed. Member can create post in new feed of their community.
> ## Lessons Learned I had the opportunity to work with Japanese people and learn about their culture.
Another important lesson learned that i learned zustand technology and applied it to real projects to manage global state instead of using redux as usual.

title: Side Projects
description: Simple projects that I built to learn or excerise my skill everyday.

## Chatify
### Description Personal Chat Room or Workspace to share resources and hangout with friends. - Live demo - Github
## Pick Movie
### Description Millions of movies and people to discover. Explore now. - Live demo - Github
## Music Player - Github - Live demo
## Youtube
## Description I used RapidAPI for fetch data from youtube and showing this to front-end - Live demo - Github
